attributes.action: BRING DEATH PENALTY FOR CHILD MURDERERS, CHILD RAPISTS & CHILD ABUSERS.
attributes.additional_details: TO STOP THESE EVIL PEOPLE FROM RE OFFENDING AND TO BRING JUSTICE TO INNOCENT CHILDREN.
attributes.background: DEATH PENALTY FOR CHILD MURDERS, CHILD RAPES AND PEADOFILISM.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Re-Introduce Capital Punishment: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/642755

Reinstate the death penalty for child sexual offences: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/651547
